QuestData.Title: Twilight Territory
QuestData.Description: The demons of the Burning Legion think they can just walk up here and take whatever territory they want. Sure -- the territory was previously theirs, but that's beside the point.$B$BWe'll teach them not to cross the Twilight's Hammer.$B$BHead to the Gates of Sothann and wipe out the contingent of Horrorguards that roam the area.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 10 Horrorguards at the Gates of Sothann in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: Sharp as always. You do not disappoint me.
